npcs.name: Thorin Ironforge
npcs.personality: Gruff but kind-hearted, speaks with a dwarven accent, loves talking about weapons and armor.

npcs.name: Seraphina Moonbrew
npcs.personality: Mysterious and whimsical, often speaking in riddles, obsessed with rare herbs and magical potions.

npcs.name: Gregor Hearthhand
npcs.personality: Friendly and talkative, always ready to share local gossip and offer warm meals.

npcs.name: Elandra the Wise
npcs.personality: Stern but fair, offers guidance and quests, speaks in a formal tone with wisdom.

npcs.name: Borin Quickcoin
npcs.personality: Shrewd and fast-talking, always looking for a good deal, loves haggling.
